    @allure.feature("爬虫任务模块")
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("case", CASES)
    def test_crawler_tasks(case, auth_token):
        allure.story(case["name"])
        allure.title(case["case_id"] + ": " + case["name"])
    
        # 替换任务ID占位符
        if "{task_id}" in case["url"]:
            # 先创建一个测试任务获取ID
            from utils.context import context
            if not context.get("task_id"):
                create_response = Request.send_request(
                    "POST", "/crawler/tasks",
                    json={
                        "processName": "测试任务",
                        "asinList": "B08XJ8J7SZ",
                        "requiredInfo": ["price"],
                        "platform": "Amazon",
                        "timeCycle": "daily"
                    },
                    token=auth_token
                )
                context.set("task_id", create_response.json()["data"]["id"])
            task_id = context.get("task_id")
            case["url"] = case["url"].replace("{task_id}", str(task_id))
    
        # 预处理请求
        request_data = preprocess_request(case, auth_token)
    
        # 发送请求
        response = Request.send_request(
            method=case["method"],
            endpoint=case["url"],
            json=request_data.get("json"),
            params=request_data.get("params"),
            headers=request_data.get("headers"),
            token=auth_token
        )
    
        # 断言
>       assert_response(
            response,
            expected_code=case["expected_code"],
            expected_success=case.get("expected_success"),
            expected_message=case.get("expected_message")
        )
